name: Reservation System
backend_requirements: 1. Reservation model: id, name (required), resource (room/table/etc), date (required), time_slot, guests
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/reservations, POST, PUT, DELETE
frontend_requirements: 1. Reservation list grouped by date, showing name, resource, time
2. Book form: name, resource dropdown, date picker, time slot picker, guests
3. Show available slots when date/resource selected

api_endpoints.description: Check available time slots (query params: date, resource)
